TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner

summary.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web-server control.

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web-server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項顯示的使用者介面，讓使用者能夠登入到主機的網站。The control displays a user interface that allows a user to log on to the host Web site. 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援控制項。The class provides design-time support for the control. 類別屬性會提供下列功能：The class properties provide the following functionality: - 屬性會傳回物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自類別設計工具，在繼承樹狀結構中的每個層級。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 屬性傳回的格式化配置中顯示的資料集合**自動格式化** 對話方塊。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 屬性會傳回欄位相關聯的範本群組集合控制項和最上層範本。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top-level template. - 屬性一律會傳回`true`，指出設計工具會建立相關聯的暫存複本以產生設計階段標記。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated to generate the design-time markup. 類別方法會提供下列功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的標記在設計階段。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法會傳回序列化相關聯之範本的複本。The method returns a serialized copy of the template for the associated . - 方法，提供用來呈現關聯的標記在設計階段發生錯誤時。The method provides the markup that is used to render the associated at design time when an error has occurred. - 方法準備設計工具，以檢視、 編輯和設計關聯。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 方法用來移除屬性，加入其他屬性，或遮蔽屬性相關聯的。The method is used to remove properties from, add additional properties to, or shadow properties of the associated . - 方法設定的相關聯區域從序列化控制項範本的複本。The method sets a region of the associated from a serialized copy of a control template. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 此範例衍生`MyLogin`控制項從。The example derives the `MyLogin` control from the . `MyLogin`是一份控制項。The `MyLogin` is a copy of the control. 此範例也衍生`MyLoginDesigner`類別從並套用屬性`MyLoginDesigner`上`MyLogin`控制項。The example also derives the `MyLoginDesigner` class from the and applies a attribute for the `MyLoginDesigner` on the `MyLogin` control. `MyLoginDesigner`會覆寫方法以進行屬性顯示在**屬性**在設計階段的方格。The `MyLoginDesigner` overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time. 它會覆寫方法來繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色的虛線框線，如果屬性`MyLogin`控制項是或值。It overrides the method to draw a blue, dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the `MyLogin` control is the or value. 它會覆寫預留位置，其中包含錯誤訊息，以紅色粗體呈現，產生標記的方法。It overrides the method to generate the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message rendered in red, bold text. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立物件屬性相關聯的控制，並將它加入所參考的物件`regions`參數。The method creates an object for the property of the associated control and adds it to the object that is referenced by the `regions` parameter. 方法會使用基底方法，以產生設計階段呈現標記控制項。The method uses the base method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 此範例會繪製，使其範圍更明顯可見控制項周圍的藍色的虛線框線，如果控制項的屬性是或值。The example draws a blue, dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible, if the property of the control is the or value. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#4)]

span.para: 如果您覆寫方法，請務必呼叫基底方法，因為它最後透過數個覆寫層級上呼叫控制項或一份要產生標記的控制項。
If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預留位置的設計階段控制項呈現包含型別名稱、 控制項名稱和宣告，並描述錯誤的訊息。The placeholder that the design-time control renders contains the type name, the control name, and messages announcing and describing the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫繼承自一個類別中的方法類別，以變更衍生自控制項的外觀控制項在設計階段。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of a control that is derived from the control at design time. 這個範例會產生一個預留位置，包含錯誤訊息，以紅色粗體呈現標記。The example generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the error message rendered in red, bold text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具呼叫方法準備好要用來呈現的設計工具時控制項。The visual designer calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 以及其基底方法設定屬性，並設定所需的設計工具的作業事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`參數是與這個設計工具或一份相關聯的控制項控制項。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 如果屬性已經定義為控制項，設定屬性的屬性，不適用於樣板化到`false`讓這些屬性不會出現在**屬性**方格。If a property has been defined for the control, the sets the attribute of properties that do not apply when templated to `false` so those properties do not appear in the **Properties** grid. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立一個衍生自類別，並覆寫方法，以變更**屬性**方格控制項在設計階段。The following code sample creates a class derived from , and overrides the method to change the **Properties** grid of a control at design time. 此範例可讓屬性顯示在**屬性**方格。The example makes the property visible in the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/CS/LoginDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LoginDesigner/VB/LoginDesigner.vb#3)]

span.para: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。
Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection. Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項使用的外部資料表容器套用在標記中的內嵌樣式規則。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 您可以將此屬性設定為移除外部資料表容器`true`。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to `true`. 移除外部資料表，讓您更大彈性如何呈現控制項的標記來套用 CSS 規則。Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會剖析為相關聯的序列化的範本所指定的控制項`content`參數，然後可使用範本來更新所指定之控制項的區域和屬性`region`參數。The method parses a serialized template for the associated control that is specified by the `content` parameter, and then uses the template to update the region of the control that is specified by the property of the `region` parameter. 屬性控制項可以使用序列化方法。The property of the control can be serialized using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得物件從基底屬性，並將物件，其中包含單一物件相關聯的版面配置範本控制項.The property gets a object from the base property, and then adds a object that contains a single object for the layout template of the associated control to the . 屬性會傳回這給呼叫者。The property returns this to the caller.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性一律會是`true`，設計工具屬性會傳回一份相關聯的控制項以產生設計階段標記。Because the property is always `true`, the designer property returns a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 屬性，方法是保存實際建立複本控制，再剖析保存的控制項字串。The property creates the copy by persisting the actual control, then parsing the persisted control string. 複製的控制項並不會影響任何持續性。The copied control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果屬性覆寫以傳回`false`，設計工具會使用相關聯本身以產生設計階段標記，以及控制項的設計階段變更將會保存在網頁標記原始程式碼。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer uses the associated itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.

span.para: 您可以覆寫屬性，以傳回或要判定其是否有類別層級標示控制項為基礎的值屬性。如果未覆寫，控制項會忽略。
You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level attribute. If the is not overridden, the control ignores the .
